Title: S7:E3 - Can you do open source full-time? (Jessie Frazelle, Bryan Liles)
Description: What does open source look like when you do it at a big company? Is it even possible to work on open source full-time? In this special episode, we talk to Jessie Frazelle and Bryan Liles about their experiences and perspectives on open source. We also feature our third episode of Tales from the Command Line, which is all about going from a really small startup to coding at a huge company. Show Links Partner with Dev & CodeNewbie!
